recommendations: Raoul Encinas
Coaching, Facilitation, and Experiential Learning for leaders at all levels, engaged employees, and culture
March 8, 2016, Raoul worked with Paige but at different companies

Paige is the go-to leader you want in today’s fast-paced, frenetic, and fun entrepreneurial world. As the co-organizer for PHX Startup Week, she delivered a professionally-run event that handled a 100% attendance jump year-over-year, and she did it working through an extended team of volunteer staff. Through her leadership, attention to detail, and creative problem solving, she was able to coordinate 160+ sessions over 10 venues in 5 days with >4000 registered attendees. Despite the typical tactical chaos of an event of this size, she did it with a smile, a resilient attitude, and an unmatched level of energy and enthusiasm. Most impressively, and what most people didn’t see, is her strategic planning and thoughtfulness ahead of time. Because of her investment in building strong and trusted working relationships, she was the embodiment of bringing a community together around a common cause. When I have a critical, high-visibility event that I need delivered professionally, the first person I’ll call is Paige Soucie.

June 16, 2015, Adrian was senior to Paige but didn’t manage directly

Since joining the Giftcard Zen team, I have had the pleasure of working with Adrian on a number of projects. He is a natural born leader who thrives in situations where a team is working together towards a greater purpose. He is constantly growing, learning and improving upon the status quo. During his time as VP Growth, Giftcard Zen was named the Fastest Growing Company in Arizona. This incredible achievement can be credited to Adrian's dedicated work towards building our Volume Partner Program and the sales team as a whole. His energy is contagious and any organization will be fortunate to have him as a leader and part of their team.

summary: Paige Soucie is a runner, family-girl and traveler. Currently based in Phoenix, Arizona, she is the Director of Marketing at Skyhook Interactive, a boutique web development agency. She is also a passionate #yesphx activist and supporter of the local tech and startup community.@MissSoucie & www.paigesoucie.com#yesphx
